# Table.GetColumnDescriptor method

Returns the ColumnDescriptor for the column having the name passed as parameter.

```csharp
public ColumnDescriptor GetColumnDescriptor(string columnName)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| columnName | The name of the Column whose ColumnDescriptor is needed. |

## Return Value

The ColumnDescriptor for the column having the name passed as parameter.
